mapper.update: UPDATE "request_file_group" SET "status" = #{status} WHERE "id" = (SELECT rf."group_id" FROM "request_file" rf WHERE rf."id" = #{fileId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "request_file_group" g WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT rf."id" FROM "request_file" rf WHERE rf."group_id" = g."id")
mapper.sql: FROM "request_file_group" g LEFT JOIN "request_file" p ON g."id" = p."group_id" AND p."type" = 2 LEFT JOIN "request_file" b ON g."id" = b."group_id" AND b."type" = 1
